name: France
comment: Born in Briançon (1993-2009), and moved for my studies afterward: for my Prep' School at Lycée Thiers in Marseille (2009-11), then B.Sc. and two M.Sc. at ENS Cachan near Paris (2011-16), and currently my Ph.D. at CentraleSupélec at Rennes (since 2016).

name: Italy
comment: Torino a few times in 1999, 2003 and 2007, and a week of holidays in Toscany in 2016. I especially loved Pisa.

name: United States
comment: 1 month in 2005 in Norwalk, CT to visit my aunt.

name: Canada
comment: 1 week in Quebec in 2005 to visit a cousin with my aunt.

name: Spain
comment: Valencia in 2005, Barcelona in 2009 and 2013 for holidays, and Cadiz in 2016 for the Machine Learning Summer School.

name: Ireland
comment: 1 week in Cork and south of Ireland in 2006 for a school trip.

name: Germany
comment: A one-day visit at Saarbrücken University in 2011, and a week in Berlin in 2013 for holidays.

name: Sweden
comment: A week in Stockholm in 2009, for a research collaboration with the French Highschool in Stockholm, for a «Math.en.Jeans» project on tropical geometry.

name: Luxembourg
comment: A week-end trip in 2013. Not so interesting... It's like Paris but more expensive. And smaller.

name: United Kingdom
comment: 3 months in 2013 for a research internship at University College of London (UCL) in London, with Peter O'Hearn and my report.

name: India
comment: Two semesters in 2014-2015 as a teaching assistant at Mahindra Ecole Centrale in Hyderabad, taught about 280 hours of first-year of bachelor mathematics and computer science. It was awesome! See the resources I wrote for the CS101 course.

name: Iceland
comment: 3 weeks in 2015, camping and hitchhiking all around the south coast of Iceland. It was magical! See here some pictures!

name: Switzerland
comment: A few days in 2003, and 5 months in 2016 for a research internship at EPFL in Lausanne with Michael Unser and Julien Fageot, for the 'MVA' M.Sc. in data science and mathematics. I ranked first to this well-known French M.Sc.! See my research report.

name: Greece
comment: 10 days in Athens, Delphi and Corinthos in 2017 for holidays. It was really great!

name: Netherlands
comment: 1 week in Amsterdam for the 30th Conference On Learning Theory (COLT) for my Ph.D..

name: Portugal
comment: (soon) 1 week in Lisboa for the CrownCOM 2017 conference for my Ph.D..
